text: "My Mistake" is a 1977 song by New Zealand art rock band Split Enz and is the leading single from their third studio album Dizrythmia. It went to number 21 in New Zealand, number 15 in Australia and was their first major single for the band. ==Track listing== ===UK 12" vinyl=== ;Side A #"My Mistake" - 2:56 #"Crosswords" - 3:21 ;Side B #"The Woman Who Loves You" - 6:46 ===Standard 7" vinyl=== #"My Mistake" - 2:40 #"Crosswords" - 3:21 ==References== Category:1977 songs Category:Progressive rock songs Category:Split Enz songs
title: My Mistake (Split Enz song)
